schema.title: Run Pod Install for React Native iOS Project
schema.description: Run `pod install` for React Native iOS Project.

buildFolder.description: Location for iOS build artifacts. Corresponds to Xcode's "-derivedDataPath". Relative to ios directory.

repoUpdate.description: Force running `pod repo update` before install.

deployment.description: Disallow any changes to the Podfile or the Podfile.lock during installation.

useBundler.description: Run cocoapods within a Bundler environment, i.e. with the `bundle exec pod install` command
